abstract.p: Schiffman EL, Look JO, Hodges JS, Swift JQ, Decker KL, Hathaway KM, et al. (2007). Randomized effectiveness study of four therapeutic strategies for TMJ closed lock. J Dent Res 86:58-63. (doi: 10.1177/154405910708600109)

body.p: In the Materials & Methods section, in the last sentence in the paragraph, Treatment Groups and Interventions, the authors reported that “There were 15 bilateral and 8 unilateral arthroscopies, and 13 bilateral and 8 unilateral arthroplasties.” The authors should have reported that “There were 9 bilateral and 14 unilateral arthroscopies, and 13 bilateral and 8 unilateral arthroplasties.”
